mapper.select: SELECT `id` as id, `contentId` as contentId, `contentName` as contentName, `start` as start, `count` as count, `createTime` as createTime FROM `content_info`
SELECT `id` as id, `contentId` as contentId, `contentName` as contentName, `start` as start, `count` as count, `createTime` as createTime FROM `content_info` ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
